text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Fort Edward, New York |nickname = |settlement_type = Town |total_type = |motto = |image_skyline = Houses in Fort Edward, New York.jpg |imagesize = 250px |image_caption = Houses at the edge of Fort Edward, near its border with Hudson Falls |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = Washington County New York incorporated and unincorporated areas Fort Edward (town) highlighted.svg |mapsize = 260px |map_caption = Location in Washington County and the state of New York. |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = New York |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Washington |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = Established |established_date = 1818 |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 70.99 |area_land_km2 = 68.93 |area_water_km2 = 2.06 |area_total_sq_mi = 27.41 |area_land_sq_mi = 26.62 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.80 |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 5991 |population_est = |pop_est_as_of = |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |timezone1 = |utc_offset1 = |timezone1_DST = |utc_offset1_DST = |coordinates = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 12828 |area_code = 518 |website = www.fortedwardnewyork.net |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 36-115-26781 }} Fort Edward is a town in Washington County, New York, United States. The population was 5,991 at the 2020 census. It is the county seat of Washington County. ==References== Category:Towns in New York (state) Category:County seats in New York (state)
